title: Tropical Thai Island Escape, Perfect for Families
description: Escape the hustle and bustle of Thailand’s busier islands with a stay at the GLOW Elixir Koh Yao Yai. Still relatively new to the tourism industry, Koh Yao Yai island is one of Thailand’s best-kept secrets and offers the perfect opportunity to unwind. Enjoy daily breakfast, cocktails and lunch or dinner as part of your escape. Plus, two children under the age of 12 stay free with breakfast!
location_description: GLOW Elixir Koh Yao Yai - OLD
offer_address: 99 Moo 3, Prunai, Koh Yao Yai, Phang-nga, Thailand

title: Barefoot Thai Villa Escape with Daily Dining & Island Transfers
description: Escape the hustle and bustle of Thailand’s busier islands with a stay at GLOW Elixir Koh Yao Yai. Still relatively new to the tourism industry, Koh Yao Yai island is one of Thailand’s best-kept secrets and offers the perfect opportunity to unwind. Enjoy daily buffet breakfast at the ocean-view Waves Restaurant, your choice of daily lunch or dinner, one daily cocktail per person at the Tiki Bar, return land/sea transfers and a lazy 2pm checkout.
offer_address: 99 Moo 3, Prunai, Koh Yao Yai, Phang-nga, Thailand

vendor_name: Anantara Koh Yao Yai Resort & Villas
title: Koh Yao Yai Island Retreat Off the Coast of Phuket with Seven Restaurants and Bars
description: Discover pristine island landscapes with unspoilt white sands, thriving greenery and crystal-clear waters at Anantara Koh Yao Yai Resort & Villas. Melt into coastal paradise with massages from the onsite spa and traverse international cuisines between seven sophisticated bars and restaurants. If you can pull yourself away from the pool, roll through the gorgeous scenery by bike, sail across the sea on a sunset cruise, or hop to the nearby James Bond island during your stay at this picturesque locale.
location_description: Anantara Koh Yao Yai Resort & Villas
offer_address: 88 Koh Yao Yai, Ko Yao District, Phang-nga 82160, Thailand
